title: vadharasa nE
sahitya:
vadarasanE shrI guru prabhAvam vAncita phalam dadAti

anupallavi

 padara jO vijita shiSya samUhA pApajula hari bhakti varEti

caraNam 1

 kAkarlAnvaya kala sapayOnitau kaLAdhara sama rUpada rEti 
nAga sthita gandharva samAna nAdOdbhava gAna rasa dhUriNEti
 
caraNam 2

 bhUsura vara nI rAmabrahma pUrva janma krta bhUri puNyEna 
vasudEvAmsha nArada vara yOgi tyAgarAja hakyA AtmajObhUditi
 
caraNam 3

 rAma nAma sudhArasa paripUrNa rAja mAnavara rasanAgrEti 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata shrI guruvarEti
